timeline.bodyText:
I'd not remove this, if anything I would look into tools to fix them right?
python black etc.
Alternatively we could merge this and create another issue to fix all the linting issues and start using black.
timeline.author: mycpuorg
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,7 +27,6 @@ phases:
       - cd model-archiver/ && python -m pytest model_archiver/tests/unit_tests && cd ../
       - cd model-archiver/ && python -m pytest model_archiver/tests/integ_tests && cd ../
       - cd serving-sdk/ && mvn clean deploy && cd ../
-      - pylint -rn --rcfile=./ts/tests/pylintrc ts/.

replies.bodyText: I think it's better to leave lint issues to the user so the latter approach is what I would go for.
replies.author: alexwong

replies.bodyText: Discussed offline. Let's remove this for now to get CI up today.
replies.author: alexwong
